title: Valve Clearance

body.body: Camshaft, valve, valve shim and valve seat wear affect the valve clearances. The effect of this wear is to change the clearance between the rocker and the adjustment shim, causing engine noise and/or improper running. If the valve clearances are incorrect, permanent damage to components in the valve train will take place and engine performance will be affected.
Valve clearance adjustment must be carried out with the engine cold.
When replacing a valve shim, always refer to the EPC.
